measured_by: changes in head orientation of the participant’s avatar
justification: “Measure of VTE (based on changes in the head orientation of the participants' avatar) paralleled findings in rodents” (referring to Santos-Pata & Verschure, 2018).

measured_by: probe trials with 180° rotated starting location
justification: “Probe trials were conducted … to assess navigation strategy by rotating the participants' starting position by 180º.”

measured_by: behavioral metrics in experiential foraging task (distance travelled, total rotation, rotation reversals)
justification: “Measures of VTE used here have been characterized in an experiential foraging task… measures included distance travelled, rotation, and reversals of rotation direction.”
